original_text: As I urged you when I was going to Macedonia, remain at Ephesus so that you may charge certain persons not to teach any different doctrine,
korean_text: 내가 마게도냐로 갈 때에 너를 권하여 에베소에 머물라 한 것은 어떤 사람들을 명하여 다른 교훈을 가르치지 말며

sentences.original_text: As I urged you when I was going to Macedonia,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 마게도냐로 갈 때 너를 권면한 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so that you may charge certain persons
not to teach any different doctrine,
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 교리를 가르치지 못하게 하려 함이라,
